legacy.full_text: Rare footage of 2 male golden pheasants courting a female has been recently caught on camera in the Zhongtiao Mountains of Yicheng City, north China's Shanxi Province. The species under second-class state protection is rarely spotted in the wild. #ChinaBiodiversity #PlanetMatters https://t.co/DnzE1hkuF0

legacy.full_text: #AfricaUnion and the #UN Peace-building Commission have met in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. According to the UN Refugee Agency, an estimated 40 million Africans have been forcibly displaced, largely due to conflict. Delegates looked at how such violence can be prevented. https://t.co/oQiYbTghtn

legacy.full_text: Three #Iraqi government ministers, backed by ousted parliamentary speaker Mohammed Halbousi, will resign in protest against a ruling by Iraq's top court to terminate his tenure on Tuesday. https://t.co/0n46XySJ9v

legacy.full_text: Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived in San Francisco on Tuesday afternoon, where he will attend the 30th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting from November 14 to 17. CGTN's Xu Xinchen has more on the agenda. #APEC2023 #ChinaUS https://t.co/Cd9TnhpGff

legacy.full_text: The #APEC Annual Ministerial Meeting is underway in San Francisco. Senior officials from 21 member economies have gathered for talks chaired by the US Secretary of State and the US Trade Representative. Hendrik Sybrandy has more on some of the issues that are front and center. https://t.co/4NTiXrBoOM

legacy.full_text: The African Development Bank has pledged 782 million euros for #earthquake recovery in #Morocco. About 3,000 people died and thousands of others were injured after a powerful magnitude-6.8 earthquake struck on September 8th. https://t.co/UuIWIVWzMS

legacy.full_text: After some 3,800 people were ordered to evacuate over the weekend due to a potential #volcano eruption, residents of a fishing town in southwestern #Iceland were given 5 minutes to briefly return to their homes to collect belongings. #PlanetMatters https://t.co/pDAbBejOmF

legacy.full_text: The #US House of Representatives passed a short-term spending bill to prevent the government from shutting down. Bipartisan lawmakers on the floor voted 336 to 95, with more Democrats supporting the measure. The legislation would extend government funding through mid-January. https://t.co/Nny4rRYDiq

legacy.full_text: #EU nations acknowledged they may be failing #Ukraine on their promise of providing the ammunition needed to fight #Russia and to win back occupied territory. Early this year, EU leaders promised to provide 1 million rounds of ammunition to Ukraine's front line by spring 2024. https://t.co/9BgHDuSHV4

legacy.full_text: #Yemen's Houthis say they have launched a batch of ballistic missiles on various #Israel targets, including sensitive ones in Israel's port city Eilat. The launch came just 24 hours after another military operation by the group. https://t.co/eacde6oGSy

legacy.full_text: Israel says its forces have entered #Gaza's Al Shifa Hospital on Wednesday as part of its operation against Hamas militants. Israel claims Hamas has a command center and tunnels underneath the hospital, where they say the hostages were held.  Hamas has denied the allegations. https://t.co/ZixWJwtnfk

legacy.description: Global Watch takes you around the world at 0400 GMT everyday on CGTN @CGTNOfficial, bringing the latest top stories and getting to the heart of breaking news.
legacy.name: CGTN Global Watch

legacy.full_text: The UN says some 2,300 patients, medical staff and civilians were in Al Shifa, where conditions have deteriorated due to the shortage of water and fuel. AP's Sam Mednick has more from Jerusalem. #Palestine #Gaza #Israel https://t.co/aE2T1xLr6f

legacy.full_text: Even weeks before the Israeli military began its operations within the Al Shifa hospital in Gaza City, Al Shifa's doctors and nurses struggled to care for the wounded and the vulnerable. CGTN's Gaza correspondent Noor Harazeen has more about the hospital. #Palestine #Gaza https://t.co/L0VjKl6KBd
